title: Can't Connect to Ranked Game
body: Started a ranked game (first game today) and am just not able to connect. Have restarted the client, retried, and still no chance of connecting. Just hope I don't get punished for it >.> Whyyyy

replies.body: Yea I haven't have tried just about anything. My account just keeps getting fresh new 20minute low priority ques...I need destiny 2 to come out

There might be a network issue that's blocking you from communicating with the game server.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and clear those blocks.  Be sure to test it in a custom, though, so you can make sure your ranked games will be okay!  Let me know if you have any questions!
